member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton
member.summary: RadioButton used primarily in DataGrids. Prevents "Name" attribute from becoming part of the Grid's naming hierarchy, which will allow the use of the group.

member.name: M:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.#ctor
member.summary: RadioButton used primarily in DataGrids. Prevents "Name" attribute from becoming part of the Grid's naming hierarchy, which will allow the use of the group.

member.name: M:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent
member.summary: Raises the change event for this Radio Button. This occurs automatically through PostBack.

member.name: M:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Changes the state of the Radio Button using ViewState through the PostBack process. This occurs automatically.
member.param: The collection of objects with StateBags

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the Radio Button. Will also allow the radio to be checked/unchecked if clicked.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.GroupName
member.summary: Gets or set the group to assign this Radio Button to.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.AutoPostBack
member.summary: Gets or sets the Radio Button to automatically postback to the server after it is checked.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.TextAlign
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in respect to this Radio Button.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.Value
member.summary: Gets or set an additional value to assign to this Radio Button.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.Checked
member.summary: Gets or sets the the checked state of this Radio Button.

member.name: E:ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton.CheckChanged
member.summary: Occurs on PostBack when the radio button is checked.

member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.PopUpType
member.summary: used to determine which PopUps are affected by the AuthenticatePopUp Component.

member.name: F:ConwayControls.Web.PopUpType.All
member.summary: the component will execute All PopUps.

member.name: F:ConwayControls.Web.PopUpType.OnlyThoseInNameList
member.summary: the component will only execute those PopUps that have been identified in the NameList.

member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp
member.summary: AuthenticatePopUp control that, when placed on a popup window, will determine if the user's authenticated session has ended. If it has, this control will close the popup and redirect the parent window to the ReturnUrl.

member.name: M:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.#ctor
member.summary: AuthenticatePopUp control that, when placed on a popup window, will determine if the user's authenticated session has ended. If it has, this control will close the popup and redirect the parent window to the ReturnUrl.

member.name: M:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.Execute
member.summary: executes the component's authentication process

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.RedirectParentWindow
member.summary: Get or set to determine if the parent window is redirected to the loginUrl.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.QueryStringProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the property that determines that the page was redirected from a popup.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the containing page.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.NameList
member.summary: the list of popup names you want this component to include during execution

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.IgnoreCase
member.summary: specifies whether or not to ignore the case of names.

member.name: P:ConwayControls.Web.AuthenticatePopUp.PopUpType
member.summary: allows the execution all PopUps or only those listed in your name list.

member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.NameListConverter
member.summary: TypeConverter specific to the NameList for the AuthenticatePopUp Component.

member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.Designers.ConwayControlDesigner
member.summary: Control Designer for Conway Controls.

member.name: T:ConwayControls.Web.Designers.RadioButtonDesigner
member.summary: Control Designer specifically for the ConwayControls.Web.RadioButton
